espresso.name: Espresso
description: Espresso is made with finely ground coffee and hot water, brewed under high pressure. It’s strong, bitter, and very high in caffeine.
It also serves as the base for many other drinks, like lattes, Americanos, Macchiatos, and mochas.
Now it’s your turn! Drag the ingredients into the crafting table to make your first coffee.
espresso.feedback: Great! You made an espresso shot. It is small in volume, big in power. You’ll feel this one kick in fast.

americano.name: Americano
description: Nice! You’ve unlocked Americano. It’s made by adding water to espresso.
It smooths out the bitterness while keeping the caffeine level high.  It’s a good pick when you want to stay alert for longer.
americano.feedback: Well done! Americano offers a cleaner, slower caffeine release — less sharp than espresso, but just as effective.

macchiato.name: Macchiato
description: Macchiato unlocked! It’s an espresso marked with a spoonful of milk foam.
Macchiato keeps the espresso’s strength but adds a touch of creaminess without diluting the flavor.
macchiato.feedback: Macchiato done! It’s bold and straightforward, but the foam smooths your taste.

latte.name: Café Latte
description: Café Latte Unlock! Let’s mix espresso with plenty of steamed milk and foam.
This can be your go-to drink when you want something mild, warm, and smooth.
latte.feedback: Great! Now you made a Latte. It has moderate caffeine and a comforting texture—perfect for slower mornings.

mocha.name: Mocha
description: Finally, let’s unlock Mocha. It is a sweet mix of espresso, milk, chocolate syrup, and whipped cream.
It's both a dessert and a drink. A great option when you want flavor and focus together.
mocha.feedback: Mocha complete! Chocolate adds sweetness, but the espresso still carries its caffeine punch.

dr_coffee.name: Dr. Coffee
dr_coffee.title: Dr. Coffee
dr_coffee.initial_message: Welcome! I'm Dr. Coffee, your caffeinated professor with a PhD in Espressology. Let me help you regain your energy!
